format: A data frame with 16 observations and 5 variables.
reference:
E. B. Andersen (1991),
The Statistical Analysis of Categorical Data, Table 6.4.
title: Ovary Cancer Data
description:
Description
Data from Obel (1975) about a retrospective study of ovary cancer
carried out in 1973.  Information was obtained from 299 women, who
were operated for ovary cancer 10 years before.

parameters.xray:
factor indicating whether X-ray treatment was received
(yes, no).
parameters.survival:
factor indicating survival status after 10 years
(yes, no).
parameters.stage:
factor indicating the stage of the cancer at the
time of operation (early, advanced).
parameters.operation:
factor indicating type of operation (radical,
limited).
